summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons administrative detention order for Jeffrey Epstein, dated July 10, 2019, placing him in administrative detention pending classification. The order states his continued presence in general population poses a threat and he is to be held until further notice.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being placed into administrative detention at the New York MCC, pending classification, as his continued presence in general population is deemed a threat.

events.title: Epstein placed in administrative detention
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is ordered into administrative detention at the New York MCC pending classification, due to a determination that his continued presence in general population poses a threat.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed in administrative detention on July 10, 2019, at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The order states his continued presence in the general inmate population poses a serious threat to life, property, self, staff, other inmates, or the orderly running of the institution.
The placement is pending classification, and he is to be held in administrative detention until further notice.
